name: Back to you
lyric:
[00:00.00] 作曲 : Nicholas James Gale|Pablo Bowman|Richard Boardman|Sarah Elizabeth Blanchard
[00:01.00] 作词 : Nicholas James Gale|Pablo Bowman|Richard Boardman|Sarah Elizabeth Blanchard
[00:03.93]
[00:13.39]I know you say you know me, know me well
[00:16.04]But these days I don't even know myself, no
[00:19.35]I always thought I'd be with someone else
[00:22.40]I thought I would own the way I felt, yeah
[00:25.66]
[00:26.16]I call you but you never even answer
[00:28.96]I tell myself I'm done with wicked games
[00:31.81]But then I get so numb with all the laughter
[00:35.12]That I forget about the pain
[00:37.57]
[00:38.12]Whoa, you stress me out, you kill me
[00:42.12]You drag me down, you mess me up
[00:45.52]We're on the ground, we're screaming
[00:48.53]I don't know how to make it stop
[00:51.93]I love it, I hate it, and I can't take it
[00:58.13]But I keep on coming back to you
[01:01.94]
[01:05.04]I know my friends, they give me bad advice
[01:07.40]Like move on, get you out my mind
[01:10.60]But don't you think I haven't even tried?
[01:13.65]You got me cornered and my hands are tied
[01:16.10]
[01:17.15]You got me so addicted to the drama
[01:19.90]I tell myself I'm done with wicked games
[01:23.41]But then I get so numb with all the laughter
[01:26.21]That I forget about the pain
[01:28.67]
[01:29.27]Whoa, you stress me out, you kill me
[01:32.97]You drag me down, you mess me up
[01:36.78]We're on the ground, we're screaming
[01:39.63]I don't know how to make it stop
[01:43.14]I love it, I hate it, and I can't take it
[01:49.15]But I keep on coming back to you
[01:54.70]Oh, no, no, I just keep on coming back to you
[02:01.11]Oh, no, no, I just keep on coming back to you
[02:05.97]

[by:Trap_Girl]

name: 渡
lyric:
[00:26.42]中文词：薛之谦
[00:27.42]原词曲：Torbjorn Brundtland，Svein Berge
[00:28.38]
[00:45.63]渡人去的夜 用稀有的火焰
[00:53.00]照亮了胆怯 燃尽我语言
[01:00.49]亏欠都是磁铁 也不能被降解
[01:07.95]都想赎去罪孽 再偷偷的怀念
[01:30.75]有人在妥协 有人拼命在狡辩
[01:37.94]人设太可怜 希望你谅解
[01:45.38]都在散播细节 肢体在蔓延
[01:52.94]都想要张新脸 骨肉别相连
[02:30.53]渡人去的夜 船离开了湖面
[02:38.06]过程很简洁 根本没人能幸免
[02:45.33]你会坠入深渊 还是不断盘旋
[02:52.88]别被渡人听见 你还有所留恋
[03:02.16]
[03:03.88]制作人：郑伟
[03:05.66]编曲：Torbjorn Brundtland， Svein Berge
[03:07.57]混音：郑伟
[03:09.28]合音：薛之谦
[03:11.16]人声录制：莫家伟（上海广播大厦200studio），吴身宝（soundhub studio）
[03:13.14]母带制作：Chris Gehringer
[03:15.06]

name: 像风一样
lyric:
[00:09.08]作词：薛之谦
[00:10.13]作曲：薛之谦
[00:11.85]
[00:31.65]我等的模样好不具象
[00:39.27]用皮肤感受你的流向
[00:47.49]你竟然能做到带走阳光
[00:55.25]我一味的跟随过了量
[01:03.78]像风一样
[01:06.32]你靠近云都下降
[01:10.38]你卷起千层海浪我躲也不躲往里闯
[01:18.60]你不就像风一样
[01:22.64]侵略时沙沙作响
[01:26.81]再宣布恢复晴朗就好像我们两个没爱过一样
[01:45.15]曲折的夕阳负责格挡
[01:52.52]让委屈的感官无法释放
[02:00.72]最近我的伤口没生长
[02:08.50]因为我躲在没风的地方
[02:17.00]像风一样
[02:19.46]你靠近云都下降
[02:23.41]你卷起千层海浪我躲也不躲往里闯
[02:31.53]你不就像风一样
[02:35.51]侵略时沙沙作响
[02:39.71]再宣布恢复晴朗就好像我们两个没爱过一样
[02:53.62]你像风一样
[02:55.91]触摸时温柔流淌
[03:00.01]席卷我所有抵抗不急着要我投降
[03:08.11]你不就像风一样
[03:12.22]掠夺时沙沙作响
[03:16.27]可惜我自投罗网你也就没什么可骄傲的地方
[03:34.66]和风一样
[03:37.27]你离开不声不响
[03:41.74]我喜欢这种收场看上去谁也不曾亏欠过对方
[03:58.76]
[03:59.31]制作人：薛之谦
[03:59.90]编曲：张宝宇 郑伟
[04:00.45]混音：郑伟
[04:00.98]合音：薛之谦
[04:01.59]鼓：褚伟明
[04:02.22]bass：宣一亨
[04:02.88]吉他：孙闻楠
[04:03.49]人声录制：莫家伟（上海广播大厦200studio）
[04:04.10]乐器录制：吴身宝（soundhub studio）
[04:04.96]母带制作：Ted Jensen

name: See You Again
lyric:
[00:12.460]it's been a long day without you my friend.
[00:18.780]and i'll tell you all about it when i see you again.
[00:25.510]we've come a long way from where we began.
[00:31.340]oh i'll tell you all about it when i see you again.
[00:37.670]when i see you again~
[00:43.160]damn
[00:43.840]who knew
[00:44.490]all the planes we flew
[00:45.970]good things we been through
[00:48.410]that i'd be standing right here talking to you about
[00:50.910]another path i know we loved to hit the road and laugh
[00:54.380]but something told me that it wouldn't last
[00:56.690]had to switch up
[00:58.440]look at things different see the bigger picture
[01:00.960]those were the days hard work forever pays
[01:04.150]now i see you in a better place.
[01:09.520]how could we not talk about family when family's all that we got?
[01:13.320]everything i went through you were standing there by my side
[01:15.990]and now you gonna be with me for the last ride.
[01:18.880]it's been a long day without you my friend.
[01:24.940]and i'll tell you all about it when i see you again.
[01:31.680]we've come a long way from where we began.
[01:37.770]oh i'll tell you all about it when i see you again.
[01:43.890]when i see you again~
[02:03.450]first you both go out your way
[02:04.940]and the vibe is feeling strong
[02:06.900]and what's small turn to a friendship
[02:08.380]turned into a bond and that bond will
[02:11.180]never be broke and the love will
[02:12.650]never get lost.
[02:16.090]and when brotherhood come
[02:17.560]first then the line will never be crossed
[02:19.460]established it on our own
[02:20.810]when that line had to be drawn
[02:22.560]and that line is
[02:23.570]what we reached so remember me when i'm gone.
[02:28.460]how could we not talk about family when family's all that we got?
[02:31.960]everything i went through
[02:33.330]you were standing there by my side
[02:34.460]and now you gonna be with me for the last ride.
[02:38.380]light guide your way.
[02:45.300]hold every memory as you go
[02:50.750]and every road you take
[02:54.210]o will always lead you home.
[03:03.480]it's been a long day
[03:06.890]without you my friend.
[03:09.770]and i'll tell you all about it when i see you again.
[03:15.850]we've come a long way from where we began.
[03:22.240]oh i'll tell you all about it when i see you again.
[03:28.470]when i see you again~
